title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Immersive Virtual Reality-Based Science Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more types of interactive activities for conveying scientific concepts in VR environments.
Learners can analyze trends in VR educational design research using systematic literature review methods.
Learners can evaluate the interaction level and openness level of VR learning activities by applying cluster analysis techniques.
Learners can develop VR simulation scenarios applicable to real science classes through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
